TriggerOraclev10g.name: AUTO_REC
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
declare

v_serial number;

begin

:NEW.TIME := SYSDATE;

select max(serial_no) into v_serial
from osd.AUTO_RECIEVED
where PROCESS_NO = :new.PROCESS_NO;

if inserting then

update osd.AUTO_RECIEVED
set REC_DATE = main.m2h(sysdate),
REC_USER = :new.user_id,
REC_DONE_DATE = sysdate,
rec_no = 0,
rec_flag = 1,
SENT_NO = 1
where PROCESS_NO = :new.PROCESS_NO
and serial_no = v_serial
and rec_flag = 0;

end if;


exception
when no_data_found then null;
end;
